name: Build a wooden shelter
goal: Safe shelter with foundation, walls, roof, and door

steps.title: Gather Materials
steps.details: Mine 20 oak logs, craft 90 oak planks, craft 1 crafting table, and use that crafting table to craft 1 oak door. See other RAG recipes

steps.title: Build Foundation
steps.details: Choose a flat, clear area. Store this origin coordinate - ALL build steps must use the SAME origin. Place the floor platform. params: { "structure": "platform", "width": 5, "length": 5, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {x, y, z} }

steps.title: Install Door
steps.details: Place door BEFORE walls to ensure proper 2x1 gap. params: { "structure": "door", "material": "oak_door", "origin": {SAME origin as foundation} }

steps.title: Build Walls
steps.details: Build perimeter walls around the foundation. params: { "structure": "walls", "width": 5, "length": 5, "height": 2, "material": "oak_planks", "door": true, "origin": {SAME origin as foundation} }

steps.title: Build Roof
steps.details: Build roof on top of walls. The roof origin Y should be foundation_y + 4 (wall height). params: { "structure": "roof", "width": 5, "length": 5, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {x: same, y: foundation_y + 3, z: same} }

important_notes: ALL build steps must use the SAME X and Z origin coordinates
Door must be placed BEFORE walls to ensure proper gap
